definition: Xingshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang/Xingshan county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Xingshan county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
Xingshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Zhaojun Village lies in Xingshan County, northwest of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 昭君村位於鄂西北地區興山縣境內。

sentences.english: And some people are also reluctant to listen to a farmer's advice on design.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人也不願意聽從劉興山設計上的建議。
